name: Overcharge (GhostMiner)
description:
Guide a robot through a grid of procedurally generated cells while trying to collect as many of them as possible. If you collect enough energy cells you can go to the next level or try to collect more cells for higher score.   If your charge drops to zero, it's game over. N O T E S - You can restart a level how many times you want if you get a bad generation.
By restarting a level  you only lose progress in that level.
Use the "Restart game" button to reset your progress. - I am aware of the typographical error in "How to play". "Restart gane" is supposed to say "Restart game"

Controls Move:   W A S D / Arrrows Restart level:   R Restart game:   Shift + R Next level:   N Pause game:   Esc / P / Pause YouTube Discord Twitter Made for Wowie Jam 4, 2022
